import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' export default function UserRegister(){ const[loaded, setLoaded] =useState(false) const [city, setCity] =useState('') const [province, setProvince] = useState('') function fetchCity(e){ fetch("https://api.goapi.id/v1/regional/kota?provinsi_id="+ e.target.value + "&api_key=zQARyGqSW5EgMYd4lzBWM3zTHPEjCk") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => setProvince(json.data)) } useEffect(() => { fetch("https://api.goapi.id/v1/regional/provinsi?api_key=zQARyGqSW5EgMYd4lzBWM3zTHPEjCk") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => setProvince(json.data)) // setLoaded(true) return(
{/* {console.log(province)} */}
